test.title: Verify success using GET method to get all post data

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with GET method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. User create script test for testing response status code, response time and response data format JSON. 2.user click send for send request method GET
custom.expected: Response status code 200 OK, response time less than 1000, and format data JSON.

test.title: Verify success using GET method to get all post data, if user create incorrect status code, and response time script test

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with incorrect variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with GET method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. User create incorrect status code, and response time script test for testing response status code, response time and response data format JSON. 2.user click send for send request method GET
custom.expected: Response status code error, response time error , and format data JSON.

test.title: Verify success using POST method to create a new data post.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with POST method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. user input new data post in body with raw and data format using JSON. 2. User create script test for testing response status code, response time, response data format JSON, response created title and body. 3. User click send for send request method POST.
custom.expected: Response status code 201 Created, response time less than 1000, format data JSON, response title and body created.

test.title: Verify success using POST method to create a new data post, if user create incorrect status code script test for testing response status code.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with POST method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. user input new data post in body with raw and data format using JSON. 2. User create incorrect status code script test for testing response status code 3. User create script test for testing response time, response data format JSON, response created title and body. 4. User click send for send request method POST.

test.title: Verify success using GET method to get all post data by ID.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with GET method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. User create script test for testing response status code, response time, response ID number valid and response data format JSON. 2.user click send for send request method GET
custom.expected: Response status code 200 OK, response time less than 1000, response ID valid and format data JSON.

test.title: Verify success using GET method to get all post data, if user create incorrect ID number.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with GET method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. User create script test for testing response status code, response time,and response data format JSON. 2. User create incorrect ID in code script test for testing response ID number 3.user click send for send request method GET
custom.expected: Response status code 200 OK, response time less than 1000, response ID error and format data JSON.

test.title: Verify success using GET method to get all post data, if user create incorrect, status code, response time and ID number.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with GET method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. User create incorrect, status code, response time, ID number script test for testing response status code, response time,and response data format JSON. 2.user click send for send request method GET
custom.expected: Response status code error, response time error, response ID error and format data JSON.

test.title: Verify success using PUT method to modify post data based on ID

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with PUT method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. user input new data post for modify data in body with raw and data format using JSON. 2. User create script test for testing response status code, response time, response data format JSON, response title , response body and response user ID. 3. User click send for send request method PUT.
custom.expected: Response status code 200 OK, response time less than 1000, format data JSON, response title updated, response body updated and response user ID is 1.

test.title: Verify success using PUT method to modify post data based on ID if user input incorrect ID.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with PUT method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. user input new data post for modify data in body with raw and data format using JSON. 2. User create script test for testing response status code, response time, response data format JSON, response title , response body. 3. User create incorrect ID number script test for response testing ID. 4. User click send for send request method PUT.
custom.expected: Response status code 200 OK, response time less than 1000, format data JSON, response title updated, response body updated and response user ID error.

test.title: Verify success using PUT method to modify post data based on ID if user input incorrect status code, response time and ID

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with PUT method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. user input new data post for modify data in body with raw and data format using JSON. 2. User create incorrect status code, renponse time, ID script test for testing response status code, response time, response data format JSON, response title , response body and response ID. 3. User click send for send request method PUT.
custom.expected: Response status code error, response time error, format data JSON, response title updated, response body updated and response user ID error.

test.title: Verify success using DELETE method to deleting data posts by ID.

custom.preconds: 1. User already access postman 2. User create environment with variable base URL and Response Time 3. User create new request with DELETE method 4. User input endpoint URL in the URL request section.
custom.steps: 1. User create script test for testing response status code and response valid data 2. User create code request DELETE method 3.user click send for send request method DELETE
custom.expected: Response code 200 OK and response data valid.
